workflow.name: Automate invoice analysis via Telegram with ChatGPT-4o-mini extraction
workflow.description:
## Introduction
Upload invoices via Telegram, receive structured data instantly. Perfect for accountants and finance teams.
## How It Works
Telegram bot receives invoices, downloads files, extracts data using OpenAI, then returns analysis.
## Workflow Template
Telegram Trigger ‚Üí Document Check ‚Üí Get File ‚Üí HTTP Download ‚Üí AI Extract ‚Üí Format Response ‚Üí Send to Telegram

## Workflow Steps
1. **Telegram Trigger:** Listens for uploads.
2. **Document Check:** Validates files; routes errors.
3. **Get File:** Retrieves metadata.
4. **HTTP Download:** Fetches content.
5. **AI Extract:** OpenAI parses invoice fields.
6. **Format Response:** Structures data.
7. **Send Analysis:** Delivers to chat.
## Setup Instructions
1. **Telegram Bot:** Create via BotFather, add credentials.
2. **OpenAI Agent:** Add API key and extraction prompt.
3. **HTTP Node:** Set authentication.
4. **Parser:** Define invoice schema.
5. **Error Handling:** Configure fallbacks.
## Prerequisites
- n8n instance
- Telegram Bot Token
- OpenAI API key
## Customization
- Database storage
- Accounting software integration
## Benefits
- Eliminates manual entry
- Reduces errors

workflow.name: Automate invoice analysis via Telegram with ChatGPT-4o-mini extraction

parameters.text:
=Analyze the following invoice text and extract key information:

{{ $json.text }}

Provide the following details:
1. Invoice Number
2. Invoice Date
3. Vendor/Supplier Name
4. Total Amount
5. Currency
6. Due Date
7. Line Items (if available)
8. Payment Status
9. Any discrepancies or issues found

Format the response in a clear, structured manner.

options.systemMessage: You are an expert invoice analyst. Extract accurate information from invoices and identify any potential issues or discrepancies.

parameters.text: ‚ùå Please send a document file (PDF or image) to check the invoice.

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
